title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 35.3 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 35.3 - Purpose

State Regulations

As a recipient of Federal aid highway funds, the New York

State Department of Transportation must have a DBE Program meeting Federal
requirements found in volume 64, number 21 of the Federal Register, dated

February 2, 1999, to be codified as 49 of the Code of Regulations, part 26. The
purpose of this Part is to implement said Federal requirements by adopting them
with the same force and effect as though herein fully set forth at
length. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
35.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
